data.title: Sniper: Nyawa atau Nyawa
data.text:
Sniper: Nyawa atau Nyawa or meaning in English is Sniper: Life or Life is a 2014 Malaysian action thriller starring Mikael Andre and Fadlan Hazim. Directed by Pierre Andre and the first Malaysian sniper movie, the film tells about Ahmad, a former sniper of an Malaysian Army special forces who has been dismissed as a self-discipline problem, Rafi was an athlete sniper and Jim, a former commando sniper, they were both found in a killing game created by someone who is unknown. Armed with a sniper rifles and some ammunitions, they were required to kill each other for their escape. In the turmoil, Rafi manages to discover who the behind the crazy game. That Ahmad, the rogue guy who actually invented the game and pretend to be a good person in the eyes of Rafi.

The following weapons were used in the film Sniper: Nyawa atau Nyawa:

Sniper Rifles

Remington 700

Rafi (Fadlan Hazim) and Ahmad (Mikael Andre), use Remington 700 sniper rifles.

Accuracy International AW

Jim (Pablo Amirul) uses an Accuracy International AW while encountered with Rafi and Ahmad.

Handguns

Beretta M9A1

The Beretta M9A1 with olive drab frame and slide is used by Jim (Pablo Amirul) as his sidearm.

Glock 34
